item.title: Stimulus in modern world
item.description: This blog is about balance. How doing something so much or less defines outcome. How reading is nice habit but overdoing it, thinking that you will be best scholar is just shadowy dream.

item.title: Freedom and Discipline
item.description: One evening of this month, oberving my sister's fight with me. I observed that when she is talking, she is using high voice to get value and be listened, i did not find any other reason behind high values.

item.title: Python Programming Language
item.description: Python is well known scripting language. We will see more about scripting languages further. At a time of writing this python is available in version 3.
